data.name: 0000 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We all met back up with Haruhi once again.

data.name: 0001 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …So in the end, nobody was able to get any conclusive data?

data.name: 0002 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi said—looking like she was sitting at 120% on the discomfort index.

data.name: 0003 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Incidentally, that "nobody" includes you too, Haruhi.

data.name: 0004 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What were you all doing?! This just isn't good enough! The SOS Brigade is better than this!

data.name: 0005 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi appeared to be angry that we hadn't produced any significant results.

data.name: 0006 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But hey, it's not like I don't understand how she feels.

data.name: 0007 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's true that we weren't able to get any new leads or information at all.

data.name: 0008 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wanted to find something that might dissuade Haruhi somehow…

data.name: 0009 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: To tell the truth, it's not like we came up completely empty-handed…

data.name: 0010 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But the info we scrounged up can only go so far as convincing her that the rumor is fake.

data.name: 0011 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Furthermore… I'm not sure where or when to even bring those things up.

data.name: 0013 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Jeez! Why won't you show up already?! Reveal yourself, man-eating classroom!

data.name: 0014 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't go kicking all the walls just because the phenomenon you're looking for won't show up.

data.name: 0015 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why not? There could be a hidden door somewhere, right?

data.name: 0016 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So I'm simply investigating!

data.name: 0017 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: From my perspective, it just looks like she's taking out her frustration on the walls.

data.name: 0018 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't be shy! I'll give you to the count of three…! Two…! One…! Go!

data.name: 0019 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's kicks were so aggressive, they left a clear imprint from her school shoes.

data.name: 0020 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …I don't like where this is going.

data.name: 0021 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Same here. I'm just praying she doesn't cause any property damage.

data.name: 0022 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: No, that's not what I mean—I'm referring to Miss Suzumiya's emotional state.

data.name: 0023 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Don't tell me you've forgotten? When frustration builds up within her…

data.name: 0024 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Closed space or whatever starts bubbling up—putting the whole world in danger, right.

data.name: 0025 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I'm sure you recall the figure of those "celestials."

data.name: 0026 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: To be honest, I wish I could forget. Memories can be troublesome things.

data.name: 0027 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Is that how critical things have gotten?

data.name: 0028 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Most likely, yes. But if you're looking for a concrete analysis, I'm afraid I can't provide.

data.name: 0029 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Which means… there's only one person here who's able to accurately grasp the situation.

data.name: 0030 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's the status, Nagato?

data.name: 0032 (379.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The space is proceeding to further destabilize.

data.name: 0033 (379.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …We must quickly respond.

data.name: 0034 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if we need to hurry, it's too tricky in this situation.

data.name: 0035 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I have no idea what we should—

data.name: 0038 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What? What are you talking about?

data.name: 0039 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi suddenly stuck her nose in.

data.name: 0040 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We're discussing who's gonna wipe clean the wall you stamped your dirt onto.

data.name: 0041 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well that's boring. Talk about something more constructive.

data.name: 0042 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Like, how to get the man-eating classroom to appear. Maybe you need a living sacrifice!

data.name: 0043 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She said something terrifying again.

data.name: 0044 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right, you probably need a human sacrifice.

data.name: 0045 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And only beautiful girls get swallowed up!

data.name: 0046 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Saying so, Haruhi's gaze turned to Asahina. Whoa whoa whoa…

data.name: 0048 (379.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Wh-what is it? Wh-wh-why are you looking at meee?!

data.name: 0049 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yep, Mikuru is more than good enough to be an exceptional sacrifice.

data.name: 0050 (379.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huhhhhh?! S-sacrifice?!

data.name: 0051 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Or maybe we could use Kyon's little sister.

data.name: 0053 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ooh, what? Is something up?

data.name: 0054 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't elect my little sister as a sacrifice like you own her.

data.name: 0055 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In the first place, the Computer Society member who claimed to witness it is a guy.

data.name: 0056 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I've never heard of any beautiful girls in the Computer Society.

data.name: 0057 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's why he didn't get sacrificed. He's lucky he was only a witness.

data.name: 0058 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru, little sister—come over here for a second.

data.name: 0059 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Okay, sure~!

data.name: 0060 (379.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: R-really for just a second, right?

data.name: 0062 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Whoa whoa, is this okay…?

data.name: 0063 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Haruhi is dead set on an idea, it's not uncommon for it to become reality. Dangerous.

data.name: 0064 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We have to convince Haruhi that class 1-10 doesn't exist by any means necessary …

data.name: 0065 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At this point, should I just try and fool her with some random made-up story?

data.name: 0066 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Those guys've been exhausted from pulling all-nighters—they were just seeing things!"

data.name: 0067 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …It would be far too easy if all it took was something lame like that.

data.name: 0068 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At this point, would it convince her if I told her what we heard about the posters…?

data.name: 0069 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't think she'd be entirely satisfied with that, but it could probably convince her.

data.name: 0070 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Should I tell Haruhi about the plate with the class name written on it?

data.name: 0071 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I tell her it was someone's prank, she might reluctantly accept that.

data.name: 0072 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's nothing to gain from just worrying about it, so I'll just give it a shot.

data.name: 0073 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll tell her that 1-10 doesn't exist—that it's a mere misunderstanding…

data.name: 0074 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi—

data.name: 0075 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Wait.

data.name: 0076 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi stopped me with his arm as I went to call out to Haruhi. …What is it all of a sudden?

data.name: 0077 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It would be wise if you stopped.

data.name: 0078 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What?

data.name: 0079 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Convincing Haruhi with words is not a good strategy right now.

data.name: 0080 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If not now, when?

data.name: 0081 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't think of it as a problem of timing.

data.name: 0082 (379.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Most likely, Miss Suzumiya—

data.name: 0083 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yes, Koizumi? You called for me?

data.name: 0084 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you find a lead?

data.name: 0085 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Bad timing. Haruhi's back.

data.name: 0086 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The sacrifice strategy is no good after all—we have to think of some other means.

data.name: 0087 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Like breaking the wall with a pickaxe…

data.name: 0088 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The things she's suggesting have gotten absurd.

data.name: 0089 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good grief. Those Computer Society guys couldn't have been lying, could they?

data.name: 0090 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Based on their behavior, they certainly didn't look like they were lying.

data.name: 0091 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Either way, that's just because they're terrified of Haruhi. They have that history…

data.name: 0093 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: #SK0E-eeeeh~

data.name: 0094 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yes, he was trembling with fear just like my little si…

data.name: 0095 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha—Hey, what happened?

data.name: 0096 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: #SK0Eeeh… Kyon, I need the toileeet.

data.name: 0097 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what?!

data.name: 0098 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I may be your big brother, but I don't know what to do if you say that all of a sudden.

data.name: 0099 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You want me to accompany you to the uncharted territory of the ladies toilets?

data.name: 0100 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: #SK0I've been holding it in aaaaall this time.

data.name: 0101 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: #SK0Tooooileeeet~~~

data.name: 0102 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just hold it a little longer—

data.name: 0103 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: #SK0Eeeeeeeh~ I can't hold it~

data.name: 0104 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We've got no choice then. I'll take you there.

data.name: 0105 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't suppose you know where the toilets are. I'll go with you.

data.name: 0106 (379.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi…?

data.name: 0107 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm gonna have a go at the Computer Society while we're at it.

data.name: 0108 (379.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay, let's go, little sister.

data.name: 0109 (379.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yeah.

data.name: 0112 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi left with my sister.

data.name: 0113 (379.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Pheeeew#sk, that was scaryyy.

data.name: 0114 (379.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Leaving behind Asahina, who seemed like she was going to be sacrificed earlier.

data.name: 0115 (379.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
